author: Paul Rankin
method: Place the pineapple slices around a large plate in a fan shape and set aside. In a saucepan, heat the sugar, water and cardamom and bring to the boil, then reduce the heat to simmer for 4-5 minutes to thicken the syrup.   To serve, pour the syrup over the pineapple and top with a dollop of cream.
ingredients: ½ pineapple, peeled and thinly sliced,  25g/1oz caster sugar,  100ml/3½fl oz water,  3 cardomom pods, crushed,  whipped cream, to serve
